okay so even though i gave my two weeks notice about a month ago i've still been working at my job they've been understaffed and i wanted to help out because i respect my manager and a few of my coworkers. until today when i finally just walked out there was a line of people throughout the whole cafe, all bitching about their lattes not being hot enough or how their whipped cream melted and my coworker was freaking out shaking and messing everything up i offered to help and he cursed me out i called the manager over to help and he treated me like a child i dont like being patronized. i finally got tired of being treated like a tool and dealing with incompetence.

Tuesday, October 04, 2005
 
emotional swtich 
hello this is none pathetic sam, 
i have chopped off pathetics head 
and put in her closet, so she won't 
be coming out anymore, as her counter 
part i would like to say, its okay to
be a scumbag, its okay to be an asshole, 
do what you want and take everything
 for granted, live the way you please,
 and step on other people, because no 
one is watching out for you, and in the 
end everyones in it for themselves

if you want to get taken advantage of. 

give me a call

as a wise man once said, "if you read this, you will judge" 


i dont understand how people perceive me at all, 
i guess it's the lack of "brain to mouth" filter,
 because i say what i mean, and i tell people 
the truth about what i see, it seems like if im
 not pushing someone away, they are leaving me 
behind for someone else, and i'll probably just
 end up deleteing this in a few days, because for
 the love of god who wants to be vulnerable on 
the internet.. i guess its the last attempt at 
letting myself know that i tried, and that im not 
good enough, at least i can say i want to be a good 
friend, shannans car broke down today, and i drove 
to howell, used my triple A card, waited for her to
 get her car towed, called the mechanics and got 
her car set up with someone who will fix it right,
 and then waited with her until she felt like
leaving, then drove her back to her house.
 i mean.. if thats not showing someone that
 i care. i dont fucking know, i guess in this 
world actions don't speak louder than words. 
maybe i should stop being so expressive,
 maybe i should fucking look straight
 ahead of me and keep my mouth fucking shut.



 



<big>fuck it. im done.
some little 15 year old boy with a black eye and a black trench coat handed me a pink rose on my break today at work.

"i could fall in love with a cruel desert that kills without passion, a canyon full of scorpions, one thousand blinding artic storms, a century sealed in a cave, a river of molten salt flowing down my throat. but never with you."

some customer at my work
told me he had just goten out of jail
and he said to me 

"we live in a judgemental society
and you will struggle all your life
but never change, and always be yourself"

" Good Friends And A Bottle Of Pills

I fucked your girlfriend last night.
While you snored and drooled, I fucked your love.
She called me Daddy. And I called her baby when I
Smacked her ass. I called her sugar when I ate
Her alive till daylight. And I slept with her all
Over me, from forehead to ribcage I dripped her ass.
Sometimes I thought you might be spying, living out some
Brash fantasy, but no. You were knocked out. But we were
All knocked out you know. In a way

I serve too many masters.

We didn't know you'd break the bottle that the magic
Came in to use those jagged shards to slit our wrists
And neck. And you'd do it too, you're that kind of dude.
But you wouldn't know what you were doing because
I didn't, your girlfriend could have been a burn
Victim, an amputee, a dead body. But god damn I wanted
To fuck.

I'm losing what's left of my fucking mind,
I serve too many fucking masters.
(I told you. I told you motherfucker)"

I wanna feel pain, it's the life that I lead"

"You got the look that makes detectives itch,

fuck you
fuck you
fuck you

"if the world gives you the blues, 
if you wake up in the middle of the 
night with waves of fear and senseless 
panic washing over you, i am your friend
. if you're overcome by desperation 
that makes your mouth open for a scream 
that never comes out but just freezes 
your face in mute despair, then you and 
i have something in common. if you can't
 understand them for the life of you, 
even though you've tried so hard, when
 that dislocation makes you feel like
 you're the only one of your species 
on the planet, i know i can confide 
in you. if this endless ghetto of lies 
and heart break, this life-long run of
 fences and flickering neon signs, 
night sweats and suicidal urges makes 
you feel like stopping, just stopping, 
like stopping breathing, wait WAIT. 
you don't have to tell me your name. 
You don't have to prove yourself to 
me. i accept you. if you're finding 
life to be the one thing thats trying 
to kill you. 
i want you to stay alive to <b>rise with the sun and fight back."
